snippet: The actor said he had known about the diagnosis for about four years. “It is a hard three letters to absorb,” he said on the “Today” show.
abstract: Charlie Sheen reveals he is HIV positive and has paid over $10 million to keep people from publicizing his condition, which he was diagnosed with four years ago.
lead_paragraph: The actor said he had known about the diagnosis for about four years. “It is a hard three letters to absorb,” he said on the “Today” show.

headline.main: Charlie Sheen Says He Has H.I.V. and Has Paid Millions to Keep It Secret
headline.print_headline: Saying He Hopes to End Extortion, Sheen Reveals He Is H.I.V.-Positive
